steps.processorData:
select
    a/context/start_time/value as dateCompositionSubmitted,
    a/name/value as xxsource,
    a_a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value/magnitude as Magnitude,
    a_a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value/units as Units,
    a_a/protocol[at0007]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.reporting_status.v0]/items[at0001]/value as inputtype,
    e/ehr_id/value as EHRID
from EHR e [ehr_id/value=:ehrId]
contains COMPOSITION a
contains OBSERVATION a_a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.height.v2]
where inputtype = 'Actual'
order by dateCompositionSubmitted desc
offset 0 limit 1
